trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Where-Object
trans-unit.target: Where-Object

trans-unit.source: Where-Object
trans-unit.target: Where-Object

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Selects objects from a collection based on their property values.
trans-unit.target: 根據屬性值從集合中選取物件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: EqualSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: EqualSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: ScriptBlockSet
trans-unit.target: ScriptBlockSet

trans-unit.source: LessOrEqualSet
trans-unit.target: LessOrEqualSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveGreaterOrEqualSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveGreaterOrEqualSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveLessOrEqualSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveLessOrEqualSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveInSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveInSet

trans-unit.source: GreaterOrEqualSet
trans-unit.target: GreaterOrEqualSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveLikeSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveLikeSet

trans-unit.source: NotLikeSet
trans-unit.target: NotLikeSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotLikeSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotLikeSet

trans-unit.target: MatchSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveMatchSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveMatchSet

trans-unit.source: NotMatchSet
trans-unit.target: NotMatchSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotMatchSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotMatchSet

trans-unit.target: ContainsSet

trans-unit.target: LikeSet

trans-unit.target: NotInSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotInSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotInSet

trans-unit.target: 顯示設為

trans-unit.target: IsNotSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveEqualSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveEqualSet

trans-unit.target: NotEqualSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotEqualSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveLessThanSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Where-Object** cmdlet selects objects that have particular property values from the collection of objects that are passed to it.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** cmdlet 會選取具有特定屬性值傳遞給它的物件集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the **Where-Object** cmdlet to select files that were created after a certain date, events with a particular ID, or computers that use a particular version of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 **Where-object** cmdlet 以選取檔案在特定日期之後所建立的事件特定的識別碼，或使用特定版本的 Windows 的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, there are two different ways to construct a **Where-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，有兩種不同的方式來建構 **Where-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: **Script block**.
trans-unit.target: **指令碼區塊**。

trans-unit.source: You can use a script block to specify the property name, a comparison operator, and a property value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用指令碼區塊來指定屬性名稱、比較運算子及屬性值。

trans-unit.source: **Where-Object** returns all objects for which the script block statement is true.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** 傳回指令碼區塊陳述式為 true 的所有物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets processes in the Normal priority class, that is, processes where the value of the **PriorityClass** property equals Normal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令也就是在一般優先順序類別中，取得處理程序，處理位置的值 **PriorityClass** 屬性等於正常。

trans-unit.source: All Windows PowerShell comparison operators are valid in the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 在指令碼區塊格式中，所有 Windows PowerShell 比較運算子都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about comparison operators, see about_Comparison_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113217).
trans-unit.target: 如需比較運算子的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Comparison_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113217)。

trans-unit.source: **Comparison statement**.
trans-unit.target: **比較陳述式**。

trans-unit.source: You can also write a comparison statement, which is much more like natural language.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以撰寫較像自然語言的比較陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Comparison statements were introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 比較陳述式是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引進。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following commands also get processes that have a priority class of Normal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令也會取得優先順序類別為正常的處理序。

trans-unit.source: These commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令是相等的，可以交換使用。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Where-Object** adds comparison operators as parameters in a **Where-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，啟動 **Where-object** 加入做為參數中的比較運算子 **Where-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, all operators are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有指定，否則所有運算子都不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Prior to Windows PowerShell 3.0, the comparison operators in the Windows PowerShell language could be used only in script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 之前，Windows PowerShell 語言中的比較運算子只能在指令碼區塊中使用。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get stopped services
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得已停止的服務

trans-unit.source: This command gets a list of all services that are currently stopped.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得一份所有目前已停止之服務的清單。

trans-unit.source: The $_ symbol represents each object that is passed to the **Where-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: $_ 符號表示傳遞給每個物件 **Where-object** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用指令碼區塊格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用比較陳述式格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令是相等的，可以交換使用。

trans-unit.source: Example2: Get processes based on working set
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 取得工作集為基礎的處理程序

trans-unit.source: This command lists processes that have a working set greater than 25,000 kilobytes (KB).
trans-unit.target: 此命令會列出擁有超過 25,000 KB 之工作集的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of the **WorkingSet** property is stored in bytes, the value of 25,000 is multiplied by 1,024.
trans-unit.target: 因為值 **WorkingSet** 屬性儲存在位元組、 25000 的值會乘以 1024。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用指令碼區塊格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用比較陳述式格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令是相等的，可以交換使用。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get processes based on process name
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 取得處理序名稱為基礎的處理程序

trans-unit.source: This command gets the processes that have a **ProcessName** property value that begins with the letter p.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得處理程序 **ProcessName** 字母 p 開頭的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The match operator lets you use regular expression matches.
trans-unit.target: Match 運算子可讓您使用規則運算式相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用指令碼區塊格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用比較陳述式格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令是相等的，可以交換使用。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Use the comparison statement format
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 使用比較陳述式格式

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the new comparison statement format of the **Where-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用新的比較陳述式格式的 **Where-object** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用比較陳述式格式。

trans-unit.source: In this command, no aliases are used and all parameters include the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 此命令中不會使用任何別名，並且所有的參數都包括參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The second command is the more natural use of the comparison command format.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令是更自然的比較命令格式使用方式。

trans-unit.source: The **where** alias is substituted for the **Where-Object** cmdlet name and all optional parameter names are omitted.
trans-unit.target: **其中** 別名用來替代 **Where-object** 指令程式的名稱和所有選擇性參數名稱會省略。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Get commands based on properties
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 取得屬性為基礎的命令

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to write commands that return items that are true or false or have any value for a specified property.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何撰寫會傳回 True 或 False 的項目，或撰寫具有任何指定屬性值的命令。

trans-unit.source: The example shows both the script block and comparison statement formats for the command.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範命令的指令碼區塊格式和比較陳述式格式。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Use multiple conditions
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 使用多個條件

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a **Where-Object** command with multiple conditions.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何建立 **Where-object** 命令搭配多個條件。

trans-unit.source: This command gets non-core modules that support the Updatable Help feature.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得支援可更新之說明功能的非核心模組。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *ListAvailable* parameter of the Get-Module cmdlet to get all modules on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *ListAvailable* Get-module cmdlet 取得電腦上的所有模組的參數。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the modules to the **Where-Object** cmdlet, which gets modules whose names do not begin with Microsoft or PS, and have a value for the **HelpInfoURI** property, which tells Windows PowerShell where to find updated help files for the module.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會傳送到模組 **Where-object** 指令程式，以取得的模組名稱不是以 Microsoft 或 PS，和在值 **HelpInfoURI** 屬性，它會告訴 Windows PowerShell 模組的已更新的說明檔中找到的位置。

trans-unit.source: The comparison statements are connected by the **And** logical operator.
trans-unit.target: 比較陳述式由連接 **和** 邏輯運算子。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the script block command format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用指令碼區塊命令格式。

trans-unit.source: Logical operators, such as **And** and **Or**, are valid only in script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯運算子，例如 **和** 和 **或者**, ，僅適用於指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use them in the comparison statement format of a **Where-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用它們的比較陳述式格式中 **Where-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell logical operators, see about_Logical_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113238).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Windows PowerShell 邏輯運算子的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Logical_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113238)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Updatable Help feature, see about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801).
trans-unit.target: 如需可更新之說明功能的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801)。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -CContains
trans-unit.target: -包含

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects from a collection if the property value of the object is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件集合中物件的屬性值是否完全符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: *CContains* refers to a collection of values and is true if the collection contains an item that is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: *包含* 是指值的集合，而且如果集合包含指定的值完全相符的項目則為 true。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入是一個單一物件，Windows PowerShell 會將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CEQ
trans-unit.target: -CEQ

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is the same as the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值與指定的值相同。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CGE
trans-unit.target: -CGE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is greater than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值大於或等於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CGT
trans-unit.target: -CGT

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值大於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CIn
trans-unit.target: -CIn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value includes the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值包含指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: *CIn* resembles *CContains*, except that the property and value positions are reversed.
trans-unit.target: *CIn* 類似 *包含*, ，差別在於屬性和值的位置相反。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements are both true.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式都是 True。

trans-unit.source: "abc", "def" -CContains "abc"
trans-unit.target: "abc", "def" -CContains "abc"

trans-unit.source: "abc" -CIn "abc", "def"
trans-unit.target: "abc" -CIn "abc", "def"

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CLE
trans-unit.target: -CLE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is less-than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值小於-等於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CLT
trans-unit.target: -CLT

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is less-than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值小於-超出指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CLike
trans-unit.target: -CLike

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value matches a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值符合包含萬用字元的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CMatch
trans-unit.target: -CMatch

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value matches the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值符合指定的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 當輸入是純量輸入時，相符的值會儲存在 $Matches 自動變數中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CNE
trans-unit.target: -但是 CNE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is different than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值為指定的值不同。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CNotContains
trans-unit.target: -CNotContains

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value of the object is not an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否物件的屬性值不是完全符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: "NotContains" and "CNotContains refer to a collection of values and are true when the collection does not contains any items that are an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: "NotContains" 與 "CNotContains" 是指值的集合，並且在集合未包含任何與指定的值完全相符的項目時為 True。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入是一個單一物件，Windows PowerShell 會將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CNotIn
trans-unit.target: -CNotIn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is not an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不是完全符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: *NotIn* and *CNotIn* operators resemble *NotContains* and *CNotContains*, except that the property and value positions are reversed.
trans-unit.target: *NotIn* 和 *CNotIn* 運算子類似 *NotContains* 和 *CNotContains*, ，差別在於屬性和值的位置相反。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements are true.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式為 True。

trans-unit.source: "abc", "def" -CNotContains "Abc"
trans-unit.target: "abc", "def" -CNotContains "Abc"

trans-unit.source: "abc" -CNotIn "Abc", "def"
trans-unit.target: "abc" -CNotIn "Abc", "def"

trans-unit.source: -CNotLike
trans-unit.target: -CNotLike

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value does not match a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不符合包含萬用字元的值。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -CNotMatch
trans-unit.target: -CNotMatch

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value does not match the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不符合指定的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: This operation is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 當輸入是純量輸入時，相符的值會儲存在 $Matches 自動變數中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Contains
trans-unit.target: -包含

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if any item in the property value of the object is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否物件的屬性值中任何項目完全符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: If the property value contains a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性值包含單一物件，Windows PowerShell 會將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -EQ
trans-unit.target: -EQ

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is the same as the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值與指定的值相同。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -FilterScript
trans-unit.target: -FilterScript

trans-unit.source: Specifies the script block that is used to filter the objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來篩選物件的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the script block in braces ( {} ).
trans-unit.target: 以大括號 ({}) 括住指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name, *FilterScript*, is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱， *FilterScript*, ，是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: -GE
trans-unit.target: -GE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is greater than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值大於或等於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -GT
trans-unit.target: -GT

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值大於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -In
trans-unit.target: 單元

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value matches any of the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值符合任何一個指定的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: If the value of the *Value* parameter is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 *值* 參數是單一物件，Windows PowerShell 將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the property value of an object is an array, Windows PowerShell uses reference equality to determine a match.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的屬性值是陣列，Windows PowerShell 會使用參考相等來判斷相符項目。

trans-unit.source: **Where-Object** returns the object only if the value of the *Property* parameter and any value of *Value* are the same instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** 物件才會傳回的值 *屬性* 參數，而且任何值的 *值* 相同的執行個體的物件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 指定要篩選的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe the objects to **Where-Object**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線的物件 **Where-object**。

trans-unit.source: When you use the *InputObject* parameter with **Where-Object**, instead of piping command results to **Where-Object**, the *InputObject* value is treated as a single object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 *InputObject* 參數 **Where-object**, ，而不是管道命令結果輸出至 **Where-object**, 、 *InputObject* 值會被視為單一物件。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if the value is a collection that is the result of a command, such as `-InputObject (Get-Process)`.
trans-unit.target: 這是 true，即使值集合之結果的命令，例如 `-InputObject (Get-Process)`。

trans-unit.source: Because *InputObject* cannot return individual properties from an array or collection of objects, we recommend that, if you use **Where-Object** to filter a collection of objects for those objects that have specific values in defined properties, you use **Where-Object** in the pipeline, as shown in the examples in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 因為 *InputObject* 無法傳回個別屬性從陣列或物件的集合，我們建議，如果您使用 **Where-object** 若要篩選的物件中定義的屬性具有特定值之物件的集合，使用 **Where-object** 在管線中，如本主題中的範例所示。

trans-unit.source: -Is
trans-unit.target: -這是

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is an instance of the specified .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值會指定.NET Framework 型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the type name in square brackets.
trans-unit.target: 使用方括號括住型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如，

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -IsNot
trans-unit.target: -IsNot

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is not an instance of the specified .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不是指定的.NET Framework 型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如，

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -LE
trans-unit.target: -LE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is less than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值小於或等於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -LT
trans-unit.target: -LT

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值小於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Like
trans-unit.target: 的類似

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value matches a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值符合包含萬用字元的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Match
trans-unit.target: 比對

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value matches the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值符合指定的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 當輸入是純量輸入時，相符的值會儲存在 $Matches 自動變數中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -NE
trans-unit.target: -NE

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is different than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值為指定的值不同。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -NotContains
trans-unit.target: -NotContains

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if none of the items in the property value is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值中的項目都不是完全符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: *NotContains* refers to a collection of values and is true if the collection does not contain any items that are an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: *NotContains* 是指值的集合，而且如果集合不包含任何指定的值完全相符的項目，則為 true。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入是一個單一物件，Windows PowerShell 會將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -NotIn
trans-unit.target: -NotIn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value is not an exact match for any of the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不完全相符的任何一個指定的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: If the value of *Value* is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 *值* 是單一物件，Windows PowerShell 將它轉換成一個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the property value of an object is an array, Windows PowerShell uses reference equality to determine a match.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的屬性值是陣列，Windows PowerShell 會使用參考相等來判斷相符項目。

trans-unit.source: **Where-Object** returns the object only if the value of *Property* and any value of *Value* are not the same instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** 物件才會傳回的值 *屬性* 的任何值，並 *值* 不是相同物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -NotLike
trans-unit.target: -NotLike

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects if the property value does not match a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，是否屬性值不符合包含萬用字元的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -NotMatch
trans-unit.target: -Notmatch 會

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets objects when the property value does not match the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得物件，屬性值不符合所指定的規則運算式時。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 當輸入是純量輸入時，相符的值會儲存在 $Matches 自動變數中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: 指定物件屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name, *Property*, is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱， *屬性*, ，是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Specifies a property value.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name, *Value*, is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱， *值*, ，是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe the objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: Object
trans-unit.target: 物件

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns selected items from the input object set.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式從輸入的物件集合傳回選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 4.0, **Where()** operator behavior has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 4.0 中，啟動 **where** 運算子行為已經變更。

trans-unit.source: Collection.Where('property -match name') no longer accepts string expressions in the format Property -CompareOperator Value.
trans-unit.target: Collection.Where (' 屬性為相符項目名稱 ') 不會再接受屬性 CompareOperator Value 格式的字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: However, the **Where()** operator accepts string expressions in the format of a scriptblock; this is still supported.
trans-unit.target: 但是，**Where()** 運算子還是可以接受 Scriptblock 格式的字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show the behavior that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示已變更的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following two examples show **Where()** object behavior that is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 下列兩個範例顯示 **where** 物件已不再支援的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show **Where()** object behavior that is supported in Windows PowerShell 4.0 and subsequent versions of Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 下列三個範例說明 **where** 物件支援在 Windows PowerShell 4.0 和 Windows PowerShell 的後續版本中的行為。
